1614720.name: Sumotori Dreams Classic Demo
1614720.description:
Sumotori Dreams is an old, popular, joke sumo wrestling game, which has come to Steam.
Control your unstable caracters, which have their own mind, try to push over your opponent, the first one falling or leaving the circle will lose.
Play against a friend sharing keyboard and screen or play against AI. Watch the characters keep falling over and breaking objects even after the match has ended. Demo version is limited to two characters and one map.
